channel.title: Population on Katrien Antonio
channel.description: Recent content in Population on Katrien Antonio

item.title: Mortality modeling
item.description: An overview of published and ongoing research papers within the mortality modeling research line developed in my lab. This research line puts focus on: stochastic models for population mortality Bayesian multi-population mortality models portfolio-specific mortality to capture basis risk micro-level lifetime data to explore the effect of risk factors on mortality rates the detection of structural changes. Quantifying longevity gaps using micro-level lifetime data Collaborators: Frank Van Berkum, Katrien Antonio and Michel Vellekoop.
